content: Discussed with my mentor the ethical concerns of my project. He suggested integrating a transparency layer. It's a new challenge, but necessary.
Working on the transparency layer. It's like adding a window to the black box of AI. Transparency is key for trust in trading.
Got an email from the quant firm. They're impressed with the transparency updates but want a live demo. Nervous but excited.
Preparing for the live demo. The algorithm's handling market fluctuations well, but it's the real test of its scalability and ethics.
Live demo went well, but there were some hiccups. The firm's team was understanding, offered insights on refining the model further.
Revisiting the project after the demo. Making tweaks for better performance. The feedback loop is real, but it's pushing me forward.
Finalizing the project for another round of testing. It's like watching a plant grow—slowly, but with care, it flourishes. Next up: integration into a live trading environment.
